refnamediv.refpurpose: returns the given loaded config variable value

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If no parameter is given, an array of all loaded config variables is returned.

example.title: get_config_vars()
example.programlisting:
<?php

// get loaded config template var 'foo'
$foo = $smarty->get_config_vars('foo');

// get all loaded config template vars
$config_vars = $smarty->get_config_vars();

// take a look at them
print_r($config_vars);
?>

refsect1.para: See also clear_config(), {config_load}, config_load() and get_template_vars().
